pages.text: A crafting component imbued with binding magic. The Key of Binding is used in various advanced recipes, particularly for creating bound tools and weapons.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: $(bold)Crafting Component:$()$(br)The Key of Binding is primarily used as a crafting ingredient for:$(li)Bound weapons$(li)Advanced sigils$(li)Magical tools$(li)Ritual components$(br2)Check JEI for specific recipes using the Key of Binding.

pages.title: Acquisition
pages.text: Keys of Binding can be obtained through:$(li)Crafting (check JEI)$(li)Ritual rewards$(li)Rare drops$(br2)$(italic)The key to greater power.$()
